short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The smart way to automate Amazon review requests from inside Seller Central

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The smart way to automate your reviews from within SellerCentral.
MiToU Butler allows you to automate pressing the 'Request a Review' button within SellerCentral like a human would do.

üïí Huge time saver
Filtering and sending reviews from within SellerCentral yourself or with help from a VA costs a ton of time. With MiToU Butler you can easily automate this tedious process.

‚öôÔ∏è Smart filters
MiToU Butler has various filters in place so you can skip orders with certain criteria - refunds, promotions, shipping promotions etc.

üîí Privacy
We understand that privacy is very important for Amazon Sellers. We deeply value your privacy - no web request is ever made in the background.

üóíÔ∏è Keep track of requests
MiToU Butler keeps track of sent requests (locally on your browser) and will display an icon next to orders that is has sent or detected a review request.

üåç International
MiToU Butler works in Amazon.com, Amazon.de, Amazon.fr, Amazon.it, Amazon.es, Amazon.co.uk
More to come ...

Stand out from the competition - automate your review requests with MiToU Butler!
